item.title: Doppler effect
item.description: Basic principle when a source is stationary, waves propagate from it with a uniform frequency in all directions when a source is moving in a medium, the waves in the direction of its movement are generated closer together (the relative velocity of the wave and source is lower) → higher frequency

item.title: genetics
item.description: [[genes]] interact to create traits → [[epistasis]] an offspring inherits a [[genotype]] from parents’ [[gamete|gametes]]

item.title: Human cardiovascular system
item.description: Tasks circulation and transport nutrients gasses ($\ce{ O_{2} }$, $\ce{ CO_{2} }$) waste products ions hormones blood cells, antibodies maintains homeostasis composition of blood almost constant

item.title: Human respiration
item.description: Tasks exchange of respiratory gases ($\ce{ O_{2} }$, $\ce{ C_{2}O }$) (in [[alveoli]] ) $\ce{ O_{2} }$ used in biological oxidation $\ce{ C_{2}O }$ end product of biological oxidation ([[glucose]] burning) gas export in the [[lung]] Inhalation [[nostrils]] → [[nasal cavity]] → [[pharynx]] → [[larynx]] → [[trachea]] → [[lung]]

item.title: human sound
item.description: Three components lungs [[vocal folds]] (within [[larynx]]) [[articulators]] Voice type affected by the size of the [[vocal folds|vocal cords]] and [[vocal tract]]

item.title: Oxigéntartalmú szerves vegyületek
item.description: [!info] Definíció heteroatomos szénhidrogénben oxigén a másik elem 1 oxigén tartalmú szerves vegyületek csoportosítása Oxigén 2 kötés kialakítására képes → 3 féle [[funkciós csoport]]

item.title: similitude
item.description: the combinaiton of a [[central similitude]] and [[congruencies]] similitudes preserve … angles ratios [[similarity of two triangles]]

item.title: Szénhidrátok
item.description: [[Oxigéntartalmú szerves vegyületek]] egyike Név eredete szén + víz ($\ce{ -OH +2H}$) [!info] Tudományos neve szaharid - édes Csoportosítás 1 egység → [[monoszaharid]]
